effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
